title: Lawyers’ organisations should not become tool of political parties: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 24 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Thursday that after reading the reply of Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA), in presidential reference in Supreme Court it seemed that the bar was a subsidiary of Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz.
In a tweet, the minister said that the job of lawyers’ organizations is not to become tools of political parties but to maintain their independent status.
He said that common lawyers were dissatisfied with the role of lawyers’ organizations and the defeat of this group in Lahore Bar’s elections was the reaction of lawyers community.
